  • titan_pylib.data_structures.segment_tree.lazy_segment_tree

titan_pylib.data_structures.segment_tree.lazy_segment_tree のソースコード

  1from typing import Union, Callable, List, TypeVar, Generic, Iterable
  2T = TypeVar('T')
  3F = TypeVar('F')
  4


[ドキュメント]
  5class LazySegmentTree(Generic[T, F]):
  6  """遅延セグ木です。
  7  """
  8
  9  def __init__(self,
 10               n_or_a: Union[int, Iterable[T]],
 11               op: Callable[[T, T], T],
 12               mapping: Callable[[F, T], T],
 13               composition: Callable[[F, F], F],
 14               e: T,
 15               id: F
 16               ) -> None:
 17    self.op: Callable[[T, T], T] = op
 18    self.mapping: Callable[[F, T], T] = mapping
 19    self.composition: Callable[[F, F], F] = composition
 20    self.e: T = e
 21    self.id: F = id
 22    if isinstance(n_or_a, int):
 23      self.n = n_or_a
 24      self.log = (self.n - 1).bit_length()
 25      self.size = 1 << self.log
 26      self.data = [e] * (self.size << 1)
 27    else:
 28      a = list(n_or_a)
 29      self.n = len(a)
 30      self.log = (self.n - 1).bit_length()
 31      self.size = 1 << self.log
 32      data = [e] * (self.size << 1)
 33      data[self.size:self.size+self.n] = a
 34      for i in range(self.size-1, 0, -1):
 35        data[i] = op(data[i<<1], data[i<<1|1])
 36      self.data = data
 37    self.lazy = [id] * self.size
 38
 39  def _update(self, k: int) -> None:
 40    self.data[k] = self.op(self.data[k<<1], self.data[k<<1|1])
 41
 42  def _all_apply(self, k: int, f: F) -> None:
 43    self.data[k] = self.mapping(f, self.data[k])
 44    if k >= self.size: return
 45    self.lazy[k] = self.composition(f, self.lazy[k])
 46
 47  def _propagate(self, k: int) -> None:
 48    self._all_apply(k<<1, self.lazy[k])
 49    self._all_apply(k<<1|1, self.lazy[k])
 50    self.lazy[k] = self.id
 51


[ドキュメント]
 52  def apply_point(self, k: int, f: F) -> None:
 53    k += self.size
 54    for i in range(self.log, 0, -1):
 55      self._propagate(k >> i)
 56    self.data[k] = self.mapping(f, self.data[k])
 57    for i in range(1, self.log+1):
 58      self._update(k >> i)


 59


[ドキュメント]
 60  def apply(self, l: int, r: int, f: F) -> None:
 61    assert 0 <= l <= r <= self.n, \
 62        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.apply({l}, {r}, {f}), n={self.n}'
 63    if l == r: return
 64    if f == self.id: return
 65    l += self.size
 66    r += self.size
 67    lazy = self.lazy
 68    for i in range(self.log, 0, -1):
 69      if l >> i << i != l and lazy[l>>i] != self.id:
 70        self._propagate(l>>i)
 71      if r >> i << i != r and lazy[(r-1)>>i] != self.id:
 72        self._propagate((r-1)>>i)
 73    l2, r2 = l, r
 74    while l < r:
 75      if l & 1:
 76        self._all_apply(l, f)
 77        l += 1
 78      if r & 1:
 79        self._all_apply(r^1, f)
 80      l >>= 1
 81      r >>= 1
 82    ll, rr = l2, r2-1
 83    for i in range(1, self.log+1):
 84      ll >>= 1
 85      rr >>= 1
 86      if ll << i != l2:
 87        self._update(ll)
 88      if r2 >> i << i != r2:
 89        self._update(rr)


 90


[ドキュメント]
 91  def all_apply(self, f: F) -> None:
 92    self.lazy[1] = self.composition(f, self.lazy[1])


 93


[ドキュメント]
 94  def prod(self, l: int, r: int) -> T:
 95    assert 0 <= l <= r <= self.n, \
 96        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}.prod({l}, {r}), n={self.n}'
 97    if l == r: return self.e
 98    l += self.size
 99    r += self.size
100    lazy = self.lazy
101    for i in range(self.log, 0, -1):
102      ll, rr = l>>i, r>>i
103      if ll << i != l and lazy[ll] != self.id:
104        self._propagate(ll)
105      if rr << i != r and lazy[rr] != self.id:
106        self._propagate(rr)
107    lres = self.e
108    rres = self.e
109    while l < r:
110      if l & 1:
111        lres = self.op(lres, self.data[l])
112        l += 1
113      if r & 1:
114        rres = self.op(self.data[r^1], rres)
115      l >>= 1
116      r >>= 1
117    return self.op(lres, rres)


118


[ドキュメント]
119  def all_prod(self) -> T:
120    return self.data[1]


121


[ドキュメント]
122  def all_propagate(self) -> None:
123    for i in range(self.size):
124      self._propagate(i)


125


[ドキュメント]
126  def tolist(self) -> List[T]:
127    self.all_propagate()
128    return self.data[self.size:self.size+self.n]


129


[ドキュメント]
130  def max_right(self, l, f) -> int:
131    assert 0 <= l <= self.n
132    assert f(self.e)
133    if l == self.size:
134      return self.n
135    l += self.size
136    for i in range(self.log, 0, -1):
137      self._propagate(l >> i)
138    s = self.e
139    while True:
140      while l & 1 == 0:
141        l >>= 1
142      if not f(self.op(s, self.data[l])):
143        while l < self.size:
144          self._propagate(l)
145          l <<= 1
146          if f(self.op(s, self.data[l])):
147            s = self.op(s, self.data[l])
148            l |= 1
149        return l - self.size
150      s = self.op(s, self.data[l])
151      l += 1
152      if l & -l == l:
153        break
154    return self.n


155


[ドキュメント]
156  def min_left(self, r: int, f) -> int:
157    assert 0 <= r <= self.n
158    assert f(self.e)
159    if r == 0:
160      return 0
161    r += self.size
162    for i in range(self.log, 0, -1):
163      self._propagate((r-1) >> i)
164    s = self.e
165    while True:
166      r -= 1
167      while r > 1 and r & 1:
168        r >>= 1
169      if not f(self.op(self.data[r], s)):
170        while r < self.size:
171          self._propagate(r)
172          r = r << 1 | 1
173          if f(self.op(self.data[r], s)):
174            s = self.op(self.data[r], s)
175            r ^= 1
176        return r + 1 - self.size
177      s = self.op(self.data[r], s)
178      if r & -r == r:
179        break
180    return 0


181
182  def __getitem__(self, k: int) -> T:
183    assert -self.n <= k < self.n, \
184        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}[{k}], n={self.n}'
185    if k < 0:
186      k += self.n
187    k += self.size
188    for i in range(self.log, 0, -1):
189      self._propagate(k >> i)
190    return self.data[k]
191
192  def __setitem__(self, k: int, v: T):
193    assert -self.n <= k < self.n, \
194        f'IndexError: {self.__class__.__name__}[{k}] = {v}, n={self.n}'
195    if k < 0:
196      k += self.n
197    k += self.size
198    for i in range(self.log, 0, -1):
199      self._propagate(k >> i)
200    self.data[k] = v
201    for i in range(1, self.log+1):
202     self._update(k >> i)
203
204  def __str__(self) -> str:
205    return '[' + ', '.join(map(str, (self.__getitem__(i) for i in range(self.n)))) + ']'
206
207  def __repr__(self):
208    return f'{self.__class__.__name__}({self})'
